thread.title: Legal Battle Between Gibson Brands and Supplier of Tuners Escalates

author: Soma Biswas
title: Legal Battle Between Gibson Brands and Supplier of Tuners Escalates
text:
One of Gibson Brands’ suppliers has stepped up a legal fight that has been brewing since December.
Tronical GmbH, a German maker of auto tuners for guitars, said Tuesday it raised the damages it is seeking against Gibson to $50 million. Tronical said it is owed unpaid licensing fees as well as payments Gibson agreed to make for research and development until 2026.
